content: With the latest publisher the eLTSS logical models are being warned that their not declaring their own version (and that they're profiles, but...). Would it be possible for the new template to have a directory or other way to segregate logical models from other parts of the IG and then become immune to this and the Schematron issue I reported a ways back?
New template lets you segregate logical models in a separate folder, but that's for authoring convenience. It makes no difference when they're processed for the build
I don't see why the warning isn't a good idea. Why not specify a version?
